description.plain:
Nau'jour Lazier Grainger (born January 9, 2000), better known as Toosii or Toosii2x, is a rapper from Syracuse, New York, but moved to Raleigh, North Carolina at the age of 13.

Toosii signed to South Coast Music Group in early 2020, the same label that rose fellow North Carolina rapper DaBaby to prominence. He is known for songs such as “Red Lights,” “Love Cycle,” “Poetic Pain,” and “Sapiosexual.”

He made a name for himself independently, releasing projects such as Label Me Diverse, Hell on Earth, and Why Not Now all in 2017.  In the same year, he flew to LA with little money. During his almost month-long stay, he met a record executive but didn’t sign. He then released the mixtapes Who Dat and My Shit Now. After signing to South Coast, he released the mixtape Platinum Heart in February 2020, following it up with Poetic Pain in September. In December 2020, Toosii released a love song-filled  EP titled DICKPRESSED.

Beginning 2021, Toosii released his second highest charting project, Thank You For Believing featuring DaBaby, Key Glock, and Latto, peaking at #25 on the Billboard 200. Toosii later released a deluxe edition featuring Fivio Foreign and Hotboii. Ending 2021, Toosii dropped three singles under the title Pretty Girls Love Toosii consisting of love songs with a guest appearance from Jacquees.

In 2022, Toosii would begin to release three singles leading up to his sophomore album, “Keeper,” “Love Is…,” and “Lonely,” all of which would go viral on the video sharing platform TikTok and would perform as some of his most popular songs.

body.plain:
Nau'jour Lazier Grainger (born January 9, 2000), better known as Toosii or Toosii2x, is a rapper from Syracuse, New York, but moved to Raleigh, North Carolina at the age of 13.

Toosii signed to South Coast Music Group in early 2020, the same label that rose fellow North Carolina rapper DaBaby to prominence. He is known for songs such as “Red Lights,” “Love Cycle,” “Poetic Pain,” and “Sapiosexual.”

He made a name for himself independently, releasing projects such as Label Me Diverse, Hell on Earth, and Why Not Now all in 2017.  In the same year, he flew to LA with little money. During his almost month-long stay, he met a record executive but didn’t sign. He then released the mixtapes Who Dat and My Shit Now. After signing to South Coast, he released the mixtape Platinum Heart in February 2020, following it up with Poetic Pain in September. In December 2020, Toosii released a love song-filled  EP titled DICKPRESSED.

Beginning 2021, Toosii released his second highest charting project, Thank You For Believing featuring DaBaby, Key Glock, and Latto, peaking at #25 on the Billboard 200. Toosii later released a deluxe edition featuring Fivio Foreign and Hotboii. Ending 2021, Toosii dropped three singles under the title Pretty Girls Love Toosii consisting of love songs with a guest appearance from Jacquees.

In 2022, Toosii would begin to release three singles leading up to his sophomore album, “Keeper,” “Love Is…,” and “Lonely,” all of which would go viral on the video sharing platform TikTok and would perform as some of his most popular songs.

songs.title: Love is...

description.plain:
In “Love is…,” Toosii displays his vulnerable side as he laments about a failed relationship.

The song employs a piano-sampled beat to establish a sorrowful ambiance that provides insight into Toosii’s sentiments. He utilizes rhetorical inquiries while contemplating suicide in the song’s Post-Chorus even though that is not what his significant other would’ve wanted. The gloomy atmosphere of the song shows a despondent and deceived Toosii who is unwilling to find love again.

The song could have a connection to his 2022 single “Keeper.” The song is about establishing a connection with the girl and wanting to spend the rest of their lives together, as their relationship, later on, appears to have gone awry in his recent song.

In the Noratchetss-directed video, Toosii reminisces about his significant other’s features and dwells on a past relationship while sitting in a dark room.

Toosii first previewed the song on TikTok. The track received numerous plays on Tiktok due to Toosii’s voice that flowed with nature and the composition of the track. It gained multiple plays on Tiktok as fans demanded its release.

songs.embed_content: Read “Love is...” by Toosii on Genius

songs.full_title: Love Is Weird by Julia Michaels

songs.lyrics:
23 ContributorsLove is... Lyrics[Intro: Julia Michaels & Toosii]
Tattoos on my arm (Bossman, you went crazy on this one)
Still scared of forever
Keep my ex's letters (Yo Sam, this shit heat)
In the third drawer of my dresser
First one hit me hard (Damn, Dawson)
Second was a feather
Playing operation
Tryna put me back together
Closed off and exposed
Salty and I'm seared
Naked in my clothes, yeah
Love is weird
Don't know how I wound up here
Yeah (Love is weird)

[Chorus: Toosii & Julia Michaels]
Leave a picture on the dresser
I knew you wasn't ready when I met ya (It shows up and disappears)
You say you gon' leave, but I won't sweat ya (Love is strange for some)
My mind been made up, plenty times I swear, I could've gave up (It ranges from making love to tears)
Plenty times, inside I'm hurt, but play tough (Now we're here, love is weird)
Everytime you give up on me, I be callin' back like we done made up
I just wanna meet whoever made love, 'cause it hurt (Oh, oh, oh, oh)
And it's weird (Love is weird)
You might also like[Post-Chorus: Toosii]
Yeah, baby, I need you to be here, be my friend
Hold my hand (Yeah)
Will you forgive all my sins?
I'll probably never fall in love again
I sat in that tub again
I had thoughts to slit my wrist, but then, I knew that you'd be pissed
I didn't, what's the point of me livin' if this the way that I'll be feelin'?
Why won't you stay? I just don't get it

[Verse: Toosii]
Cryin' to nobody else
I ain't got nobody help

Yeah, stay on the other side of the fence
I done noticed what's for you is for you, what's meant is meant
I done did a lot for us than just make love
Then, it's like we break up, see, you like to take stuff
Take my heart and put it on the train tracks
Or take a silver bullet and just aim it where my brain at
Bleed for ya, breath for ya, here for ya, need for ya
Don't know how you did it, never saw myself leavin' ya
Thought you wouldn't change, but it's okay, I still believe in ya
Even though I can't tell you what it was that I seen in ya
Hard times, they only get better
I had told you I won't let up
Told you, one day I'ma rock you like my sweater
Told you one day, I would treat you way, way better than he ever did
You messed it up
I know you don't care, but now, you out of love
Life is tough, you the one that been 'round when my life was rough
I was there, I'm the one who came around and piped you up
How I'm supposed to make you mine when you can't make a house a home?
Baby, I thought that we was grown, some things I wish would've been shown
You don't really love me, I just wish I would've known
It's been easier, just tryna be alone (Yeah)
[Chorus: Toosii & Julia Michaels]
Leave a picture on the dresser
I knew you wasn't ready when I met ya (It shows up and disappears)
You say you gon' leave, but I won't sweat ya (Love is strange for some)
My mind been made up, plenty times I swear, I could've gave up (It ranges from making love to tears)
Plenty times, inside I'm hurt, but play tough (Now we're here, love is weird)
Everytime you give up on me, I be callin' back like we done made up
I just wanna meet whoever made love, 'cause it hurt (Oh, oh, oh, oh)
And, it's weird (Love is weird)

[Post-Chorus: Toosii]
Yeah, baby, I need you to be here, be my friend
Hold my hand (Yeah)
Will you forgive all my sins?
I'll probably never fall in love again
I sat in that tub again
I had thoughts to slit my wrist, but then, I knew that you'd be pissed
I didn't, what's the point of me livin' if this the way that I'll be feelin'?
Why won't you stay? I just don't get it

[Outro: Julia Michaels]
Love is weird, love is weird
Ooh-ooh-ooh
Love is weird9Embed

songs.title: Favorite Song

description.plain:
“Favorite Song” sees the New York rapper maintain his hot streak of R&B, love-induced tracks following his previous hits, “Love Is…,” “Heartaches,” and the recently released “Magic Potion.”

The song utilizes a sample from Tatiana Manaois‘ November 2022 “You Might As Well.” In the track, Toosii directs the song toward his significant other who he notes is a fan of his music. The warm melody backed by Toosii’s rap flow enhances the song’s meaning as he describes the perfect man for his significant other — conveniently, he notes that he’s describing himself.

Toosii first uploaded a snippet of the song to his TikTok and Intagram page alongside an array of other snippets such as “Woo Lady,” “Another Love Song,” and “Georgia.” After uploading the snippet, the song received major attention, due to which fans demanded its release.

Due to the rising popularity, through a fan page, Toosii had made it clear that if the song received fifty thousand pre-saves, he would release the track.

songs.embed_content: Read “Favorite Song” by Toosii on Genius

The song utilizes a sample from Tatiana Manaois‘ November 2022 “You Might As Well.” In the track, Toosii directs the song toward his significant other who he notes is a fan of his music. The warm melody backed by Toosii’s rap flow enhances the song’s meaning as he describes the perfect man for his significant other — conveniently, he notes that he’s describing himself.

Toosii first uploaded a snippet of the song to his TikTok and Intagram page alongside an array of other snippets such as “Woo Lady,” “Another Love Song,” and “Georgia.” After uploading the snippet, the song received major attention, due to which fans demanded its release.

Due to the rising popularity, through a fan page, Toosii had made it clear that if the song received fifty thousand pre-saves, he would release the track.
